snippet: Craig Wright of Brooklyn was charged with gang assault, assault and unlawful imprisonment in the beating of Alexian Lien on Sept. 29.
abstract: Craig Wright of Brooklyn is charged with gang assault, assault and unlawful imprisonment in beating of Alexian Lien, who was pulled from his SUV after high-speed chase and confrontation with large group of motorcyclists on Henry Hudson Parkway; three others have been charged in case.
lead_paragraph: Craig Wright of Brooklyn was charged with gang assault, assault and unlawful imprisonment in the beating of Alexian Lien on Sept. 29.

headline.main: Fourth Motorcyclist Is Charged in Attack on Driver of S.U.V.
headline.print_headline: 4th Motorcyclist Charged in Attack On S.U.V. Driver
